Package gears.sidescroller.world.tileMaps

Class OpenTileSearch

java.lang.Object
gears.sidescroller.world.tileMaps.OpenTileSearch
public class OpenTileSearch extends Object
The OpenTileSearch class is used to store algorithms used to find valid coordinates in a TileMap. Note that you must instantiate this to use these methods, as they are not static.

  • Method Details

    • searchForOpenTileAround

      public final Point searchForOpenTileAround(TileMap map, int initialXIdx, int initialYIdx)
      Searches for an intangible tile index around the given tile map coordinates.
      Parameters:
      map - the TileMap to search for an open tile in
      initialXIdx - the tile x index to check for intangible tiles around
      initialYIdx - the tile y index to check fro intangible tiles around
      Returns:
      the indeces of an intangible tile around the given tile, or null if no open tiles exist

    • searchForOpenTileAlongSide

      public final Point searchForOpenTileAlongSide(TileMap map, int initialXIdx, int initialYIdx, Direction whatSide)
      Searches for an open tile along one side of the given map. It attempts to find a point as close the the given initial indeces as possible.
      Parameters:
      map - the map to search for an open tile in
      initialXIdx - the x-coordinate this should find a point close to, measured in index-space.
      initialYIdx - the y-coordinate this should find a point close to, measured in index-space.
      whatSide - the side of the TileMap to check for open tiles along.
      Returns:
      the index of an open tile, or null if no such tile exists
